editions.flavor: The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
Auspicious fortune and good tidings follow the silver tiger on its fleet-footed journey through seasons.

effect: **On Enter:** Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Turbulent zephyrs swirl around the soul, inspiring fleet-footed dreams and expedited efficiency.
name: Spirit of Wind
effect_html: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

effect: **On Enter:** You may put a **preparation** counter on Tristan. If you don’t, you gain **agility 3** for this turn. *(**Agility 3** — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)*
effect_raw: On Enter: You may put a preparation counter on Tristan. If you don’t, you gain agility 3 for this turn. (Agility 3 — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)
flavor: “Consider it done. Just worry about my payment.”
name: Tristan, Underhanded
effect_html: On Enter: You may put a preparation counter on Tristan. If you don’t, you gain agility 3 for this turn. (Agility 3 — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)

effect:
**Tristan Lineage**

**On Enter:** If CARDNAME has two or more **preparation** counters on her, draw a card. Then if CARDNAME has four or more **preparation** counters on her, draw an additional card.
effect_raw:
Tristan Lineage

On Enter: If Tristan has two or more preparation counters on her, draw a card. Then if Tristan has four or more preparation counters on her, draw an additional card.
name: Tristan, Hired Blade
effect_html: Tristan LineageOn Enter: If Tristan has two or more preparation counters on her, draw a card. Then if Tristan has four or more preparation counters on her, draw an additional card.

effect:
**Tristan Lineage**

**On Enter: Summon** two Ominous Shadow tokens and put a **preparation** counter on CARDNAME.

**Remove two preparation counters from CARDNAME:** Change the target of an attack that targets Tristan to a phantasia ally you control.
effect_raw:
Tristan Lineage

On Enter: Summon two Ominous Shadow tokens and put a preparation counter on Tristan.

Remove two preparation counters from Tristan: Change the target of an attack that targets Tristan to a phantasia ally you control.
name: Tristan, Shadowdancer
effect_html: Tristan LineageOn Enter: Summon two Ominous Shadow tokens and put a preparation counter on Tristan.Remove two preparation counters from Tristan: Change the target of an attack that targets Tristan to a phantasia ally you control.

effect: If your champion would take damage, you may banish CARDNAME. If you do, prevent 1 of that damage. Put a **preparation** counter on your champion if damage was prevented this way.
effect_raw: If your champion would take damage, you may banish Assassin's Mantle. If you do, prevent 1 of that damage. Put a preparation counter on your champion if damage was prevented this way.
flavor: A good assassin is never seen without a means to veil their presence, but a masterful assassin is never seen.
name: Assassin's Mantle
effect_html: If your champion would take damage, you may banish Assassin's Mantle. If you do, prevent 1 of that damage. Put a preparation counter on your champion if damage was prevented this way.

effect: [Class Bonus] As long as your champion is attacking an ally, CARDNAME gets +1 [POWER]. *(Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] As long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1 POWER. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Its curved edge is perfect for slicing through the flesh of both man and monster.
name: Curved Dagger
effect_html: Class Bonus As long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. HOwever, whwat came back was but only a husk.
— Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa
name: Life Essence Amulet
effect_html: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.

effect:
CARDNAME enters the field rested.

[REST]**, Banish CARDNAME:** Deal 1 damage to target unit. **Class Bonus:** Until end of turn, if that unit were to take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.

Poisoned Dagger enters the field rested.

REST, Banish Poisoned Dagger: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Until end of turn, if that unit were to take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.
flavor: A little poison goes a long way.
name: Poisoned Dagger
effect_html: Poisoned Dagger enters the field rested., Banish Poisoned Dagger: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Until end of turn, if that unit were to take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.

effect: [Class Bonus] **On Champion Hit:** You may have that opponent swap the cards in their hand and memory. Then if there are four or more cards in their memory, deal 2 unpreventable damage to the hit champion.

flavor: Weapons can be used for more than just killing.
name: Malignant Athame
effect_html: Class Bonus On Champion Hit: You may have that opponent swap the cards in their hand and memory. Then if there are four or more cards in their memory, deal 2 unpreventable damage to the hit champion.

effect:
**Prepare 3**

**On Hit:** If CARDNAME was **prepared**, you may have the attacker declare an additional attack. If you do, create a copy of CARDNAME in that attacker's intent except it isn't **prepared** and it gets +3 [POWER].
effect_raw:
Prepare 3

On Hit: If Slice and Dice was prepared, you may have the attacker declare an additional attack. If you do, create a copy of Slice and Dice in that attacker's intent except it isn't prepared and it gets +3 POWER.
name: Slice and Dice

rule.description: If you have the attacker declare an additional attack, the effect will end the current combat and start a new combat. Any effects that were pending resolution will be banished and a new combat will immediately begin.
The copy of Slice and Dice is added to the intent after declaration of the attack. This is not a trigger and cannot be responded to.
You may choose a new attack target for the additional attack.
The new attack does not require your champion to be awake since only playing attack cards has the additional cost of resting your champion.

effect_html: Prepare 3On Hit: If Slice and Dice was prepared, you may have the attacker declare an additional attack. If you do, create a copy of Slice and Dice in that attacker's intent except it isn't prepared and it gets +3.
